scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:html && npm run build:styles && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:assets: cp -r src/images dist && cp -r src/js dist
scripts.watch:sass: node-sass src/css/style.scss src/css/style.css && node-sass -o src/css/ -w src/css/ &
scripts.dev: npm run watch && browser-sync start --server "src" --directory --files="src/css/style.css, src/*.html"
